name: d3-plot
description: Plots a given array of nodes to a given line

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-plot.js -- index.js
scripts.uglify: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-plot.js -c -m -o build/d3-plot.min.js
scripts.publish: npm run uglify && zip -j build/d3-plot.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-plot.js build/d3-plot.min.js
